t: Feather Chair - 13.5 lbs – Feather Mobility
s: At only 13.5 pounds*, the Feather Chair is one of the lightest wheelchairs on the planet. Taking advantage of brand-new materials, the Feather Chair sets a new standard. Practically everyone can lift this wheelchair into their car, truck or SUV. It is super easy to propel and push.
